name: Eye-Care Industries European Economic Interest Grouping
goal:
The objects of the ECI-EEIG shall be:

1 to represent the views of the ECI-EEIG to interested parties including the institutions of the European Union and European Economic Area, international governmental organisations, national governments, governmental agencies, standards and pharmacopoeial bodies, notified bodies and other similar persons and bodies having an interest in the eye-care industry;

2 to facilitate the development of the Membersâ€™ economic activities in the context of relevant European legislation, regulation and regulatory guidance;

3 to provide a forum for the exchange of ideas and discussion of items of interest to Members in relation to the matters set out in 1 and 2;

4 to do such other things as are incidental or conducive to the attainment of the above objects or any of them, and are at all times in compliance with Article 3 of Council Regulation 2137/85/EEC.
interests: Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
EU Regulations on medicinal products, medical devices and nutritional products as well as related guidelines
National legislation on medicinal products, medical devices and nutritional products as well as related guidelines
